name: Almanach de la Survie (IAPSOP)
content:
Almanach de la Survie (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: Almanach de la Survie Summary:  From Pat Deveney's database: Almanach de la Survie pour l'annee [1900]. 1900 Annual Paris, France. Publisher: Chamuel. Editor: Albin Valabregue. 1/1, 1900. 74 pp. The almanac was said to have been produced to expound a scientific form of spiritualism in contradistinction to what was said to be the prevailing sectarianism. Includes a discourse by the spirit of Allen Kardec and a play illustrative of the beauties of socialism. BNF Issues:Almanach de la Survie 1900
